hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever buys food, let him not sell it until he has taken full possession of it.'" (Sahih) In his narration, (one of the narrators) Abu 'Awanah said: "Ibn 'Abbas said: 'I think everything is like food

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ بَيْعِ الطَّعَامِ، قَبْلَ أَنْ يُقْبَضَ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Selling Food Before Taking Possession Of It
